member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces9.IVsApplicationConfiguration
member.summary: Provides an interface for use when working with configuration files.

member.name: E:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces9.IVsApplicationConfiguration.ConfigurationChanged
member.summary: Occurs when a project's configuration has changed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces9.IVsApplicationConfiguration.FileExists
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether a configuration file exists on disk.
member.returns: true if the file exists; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces9.IVsApplicationConfiguration.FilePath
member.summary: Returns the path for a configuration file.
member.returns: A string that contains the full path for the configuration file.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces9.IVsApplicationConfiguration.LoadConfiguration
member.summary: Loads the configuration for a given hierarchy/itemid.
member.exception: The configuration hierarchy is not in a loadable state.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces9.IVsApplicationConfiguration.QueryEditConfiguration
member.summary: Determines if a configuration file can be modified.
member.returns: true if the configuration file can be modified; otherwise false.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces9.IVsApplicationConfigurationManager
member.summary: Provides access to instances that correspond to the configuration hierarchy at a given level in a project.

member.summary: Returns an object that corresponds to the object for a project at the level indicated by the and parameters.
member.param: The constant which represents the root node of the project hierarchy.
